<<<<<<< HEAD
Pharisaisme and Christianity compared and set forth in a sermon at Pauls Crosse, May 1. 1608. By I.H. Vpon Matth. 5.20. Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
[4], 63, [1] p.
Printed by Melchisedech Bradwood for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bul-head, London : Anno 1608.
I.H. = Joseph Hall. Bound and filmed with STC 12693.7 (formerly STC 12695). Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.
=======
